meanings.definition: Convert (an image or font) into pixels for display on a computer screen.
meanings.sent1: I will rasterise the logo to make it suitable for the website.
meanings.sent2: Graphic designers often rasterise images to ensure they appear correctly on screens.
meanings.sent3: Why did the computer refuse to rasterise the picture? It pixelated in protest!
meanings.sent4: Her mind seemed to rasterise the memories, each one becoming a vivid pixel in her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes rasterise the scene, creating a digital masterpiece.
